name: Seweryn Krukowski
story: Seweryn grew up in a small village in Poland. He always had a natural talent for survival skills and developed a passion for exploring the wilderness. After completing his mandatory military service, he joined a private military company as a freelance soldier. He has been involved in various operations in conflict zones around the world, using his skills as a looter to scavenge for resources and weapons. Seweryn keeps in contact with his wife and young son back in Poland, and dreams of one day retiring with them to his beloved countryside.
